post_message: Today I introduced a bill that calls for an immediate moratorium on visas for refugees. My bill will also stop all refugees as well as others from obtaining visas to immigrate, visit, or study in the U.S. from about 30 countries that have significant jihadist movements. This bill will be paid for with a special tax on arms sales to any of these countries. Read more here: @webpagelink
